tags.name: include
tags.description: Includes another template, at the path specified by the src attribute

attributes.name: src
attributes.description: Contains the location of the template to include.

attributes.name: noparse
attributes.description: Do not render the contents of the included template.

attributes.name: noteddy
attributes.description: Do not render the contents of the included template.

tags.name: arg
tags.description: The arg tag represents an argument that is passed to a template. When placed inside an include tag, the arg's inner HTML is passed to the included template, accessible via the arg's attribute name.

tags.name: if
tags.description: Conditional tag for Teddy templates. HTML inside an if tag will be included if the specified condition evaluates to true. <if varName> will check for the existance of varName. <if varName='x'> will check if varName is equal to x

tags.name: unless
tags.description: Conditional tag for teddy templates. Checks for non-presence of the given variable. HTML inside an unless tag will be included if the specified variable is not present.

tags.name: elseif
tags.description: Conditional tag for teddy templates. Evaluated if the preceding if fails.

tags.name: elseunless
tags.description: Conditional tag for teddy templates. Evaluated if the preceding unless fails.

tags.name: else
tags.description: Conditional tag for teddy templates. HTML inside an else tag will be included if the preceding conditionals fail.

tags.name: loop
tags.description: Creates a loop, used in Teddy templates. The variable to iterate over is defined by through, and a local variable is defined by val.

attributes.name: through
attributes.description: Specifies the variable in the model to iterate over.

attributes.name: val
attributes.description: Specifies the name of a local variable to use within a loop, containing the current value.

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: Specifies the name of a local variable to use within a loop, containing the current key.

tags.name: noteddy
tags.description: HTML within a noteddy tag will not be parsed by teddy.
